name: The Infinite (Oleg_DJ)
description:
Have you ever thought about your simplicity? My game may seem simple and pointless, but it is not.

Controls:

WASD - Move;

Mouse - View;

Left Mouse Button - Interact;

What to Do?

Well, you need to adhere to the schedule that is written near the bed, that is, have a breakfast (Interact with sausage in the kitchen), go to work (Interact with door), go to bed (Interact with bed). There is a plot in my game that can even lead to morality. Game for an amateur, for philosophers will come.

P.S. I made this game for Game Jam 2022 25$. Also, I had no team, so what you see was made only by me:/
